ViewObject.Name: DefaultOcVerificationDocsView
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT --COUNT(*) DOC_COUNT EDI.ESDI_ID, OL.LINE_ID, SD.DOCUMENT_ID, SD.VERIFIED, EDI.ADDED_BY_ROLE, SD.GRADE_ID FROM RMI_SEAFARER.RMI_SEAFARER_DOCS_IFACE EDI, ONT.OE_ORDER_LINES_ALL OL, SICD.SICD_DOCUMENTS SD, --APPS.RMI_SICD_DOCUMENT_UNVERIFIED_V SDU ( SELECT ss.last_name||', '||ss.first_name|| ' (FIN '||TO_CHAR (ss.seafarer_id)||')'seafarer_name, ss.birth_date, oe.order_number, sg.grade_code, sg.verification_reqd, sc.country_name, sd.endorsement_number, sd.endorsement_issue_date, sd.endorsement_expiration_date, sd.document_id, sc.verification_method, sc.verification_url, sc.verification_email, sc.verification_username, sc.verification_password, sd.grading_status, sd.grade_id, 'OC' certificate_type, sd.document_type, sd.verified, sd.endorsement_country, sd.header_id header_id, ss.seafarer_id, sd.verification_edoc_id, DECODE (NVL (oe.attribute9, 'N'), 'N', 'N', 'Y') external_order, TO_CHAR (oe.salesrep_id) salesrep_id, sd.created_by, sd.creation_date, sd.last_updated_by, sd.last_update_date, sd.last_update_login FROM sicd_documents sd, sicd_seafarers ss, sicd_grades sg, sicd_countries sc, oe_order_headers_all oe WHERE ss.seafarer_id = sd.seafarer_id AND sg.grade_id = sd.grade_id AND sc.country_code = sd.ENDORSEMENT_COUNTRY AND oe.header_id = sd.header_id -- AND NVL (sd.verified, 'P') = 'P' AND sd.document_type = 'OC' AND sd.certificate_type = 'OC' AND (sg.verification_reqd = 'Y' OR NVL (sd.grading_status, 'xx') = 'V') AND oe.attribute9 = 'Pending C.O.C. Verification' ) SDU WHERE SDU.DOCUMENT_ID = SD.DOCUMENT_ID AND SD.LINE_ID = OL.LINE_ID AND TO_NUMBER(OL.ATTRIBUTE12) = EDI.ESDI_ID AND EDI.ESDI_ID = :pEsdiId
